name: Cactus Canyon
summary: Cactus Canyon is a fun singleplayer western style shooter game with procedurally generated world every time you start the game or a new level! You play as the sheriff, who does not like bandits at all, and she is determined to eliminate all of them. Your job is to help the sheriff as she travels through many canyons to eliminate all of the cactus bandits and their sneaky sidekick crabs. Cactus Canyon provides a retro arcade game feeling to it with some hand drawn pixel art and an awesome level each time you play.
